title: How to Make Salsa
description:
Learn How to Make Salsa with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Salsa

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make salsa first add one 28-ounce or 800 gram can of whole tomatoes to a blender or food processor then add 1/2 cup or 25 grams of chopped cilantro and 1/4 cup or 35 grams of chopped onion next place 1 minced garlic clove and 1 chopped jalapeno in the blender and sprinkle 1/2 TSP or 2 grams each of cumin and salt over all of the ingredients add the juice from half of a lime to for even more flavor finally pulse everything together 4 to 6 times or until the salsa is the consistency you'd like refrigerate for 1 hour then enjoy if you want to make salsa with fresh tomatoes instead of canned ones just add 3 cups or 375 grams of chopped roma tomatoes to the blender in place of the canned tomatoes add the other ingredients pulse everything 4 to 6 times and you're doneto make salsa first add one 28-ounce or 800 gram can of whole tomatoes to a blender or food processor then add 1/2 cup or 25 grams of chopped cilantro and 1/4 cup or 35 grams of chopped onion next place 1 minced garlic clove and 1 chopped jalapeno in the blender and sprinkle 1/2 TSP or 2 grams each of cumin and salt over all of the ingredients add the juice from half of a lime to for even more flavor finally pulse everything together 4 to 6 times or until the salsa is the consistency you'd like refrigerate for 1 hour then enjoy if you want to make salsa with fresh tomatoes instead of canned ones just add 3 cups or 375 grams of chopped roma tomatoes to the blender in place of the canned tomatoes add the other ingredients pulse everything 4 to 6 times and you're done

title: How to Make Scrambled Eggs
description:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make scrambled eggs start by beating eggs in a bowl with a whisk or fork use 2 eggs per serving if you want creamy scrambled eggs you can also mix in 1 and 1/2 tablespoon of milk or cream next heat some butter or oil in a pan over medium-high heat pour the eggs into the pan reduce the heat to low and stir the eggs while they cook for 3 to 4 minutes remove the pan from the heat and serveto make scrambled eggs start by beating eggs in a bowl with a whisk or fork use 2 eggs per serving if you want creamy scrambled eggs you can also mix in 1 and 1/2 tablespoon of milk or cream next heat some butter or oil in a pan over medium-high heat pour the eggs into the pan reduce the heat to low and stir the eggs while they cook for 3 to 4 minutes remove the pan from the heat and serve

title: How to Make Spaghetti
description:
Learn How to Make Spaghetti with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Spaghetti

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make spaghetti add four quarts or 3.8 liters of water to a pot for every one pound or 0.45 kilograms of pasta you're making bring the water to a boil and add 1 tablespoon or 17 grams of salt to give it more flavor next add the noodles to the boiling water and stir them for one to two minutes so they don't stick together cook for a total of 8 to 12 minutes or until the spaghetti is al dente cooked but slightly firm in the center when you bite it drain into a colander if you like save about 1 cup or 240 milliliters of the cooking water to thin out your spaghetti sauce if it's too thick finally put the noodles back into the pot and pour your sauce on the top mix together and enjoyto make spaghetti add four quarts or 3.8 liters of water to a pot for every one pound or 0.45 kilograms of pasta you're making bring the water to a boil and add 1 tablespoon or 17 grams of salt to give it more flavor next add the noodles to the boiling water and stir them for one to two minutes so they don't stick together cook for a total of 8 to 12 minutes or until the spaghetti is al dente cooked but slightly firm in the center when you bite it drain into a colander if you like save about 1 cup or 240 milliliters of the cooking water to thin out your spaghetti sauce if it's too thick finally put the noodles back into the pot and pour your sauce on the top mix together and enjoy

title: How to Make Tea
description:
Learn how to make tea with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Tea

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make tea from tea leaves start by placing the leaves in an infuser or strainer once filled place the tea strainer in a mug or tea pot then pour boiling water over it you want about 1 to 3 teaspoons of leaves for every 8 to 12 ounces of water depending on your preference for the strength and taste of your tea next allow the tea to steep a good rule of thumb is two minutes for green tea four minutes for black tea and five minutes for herbal tea once your tea is ready remove the strainer and serve adding lemon milk and sugar as desired for an even easier cup of tea you can just use a tea bag and pour boiling water directly over then let your tea steep until it is readyto make tea from tea leaves start by placing the leaves in an infuser or strainer once filled place the tea strainer in a mug or tea pot then pour boiling water over it you want about 1 to 3 teaspoons of leaves for every 8 to 12 ounces of water depending on your preference for the strength and taste of your tea next allow the tea to steep a good rule of thumb is two minutes for green tea four minutes for black tea and five minutes for herbal tea once your tea is ready remove the strainer and serve adding lemon milk and sugar as desired for an even easier cup of tea you can just use a tea bag and pour boiling water directly over then let your tea steep until it is ready

title: How to make Tomato Puree
description:
Thanks for watching the video !!
Make a cross at the end of the Tomato with a sharp knife.
Immerse the Tomatoes in boiling water.
When the skin separates from the flesh,take the tomatoes out. Let it cool.
Remove the skin gently using a thin sharp knife .
Cut the tomato's red outer surface. Avoid the seed and inside portion to get the desired red color.
Saute the tomato flesh in a nonstick pan .You can add the tomato juice from inside for more flavour.
When they are of a very thick consistency , turn off the heat , let it cool & blend them into a smooth thick tomato puree.

Taken From   http://aromatickitchen.blogspot.com/2008/12/how-to-make-tomato-puree.html

title: How to Make Waffles
description:
Learn How to Make Waffles with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Waffles

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make waffles first pre-heat your waffle iron then add two eggs to a large bowl and beat them with a whisk or hand mixer until they're fluffy beating the eggs first we'll make your waffles light and airy add 2 cups 260 grams of all-purpose flour 1 in 3/4 cups 415 milliliters of milk and half a cup 120 milliliters of vegetable oil to the bowl next add 1 tablespoon 12 and 1/2 grams of sugar 4 teaspoons 15 grams of baking powder and 1/4 teaspoon 1 and 1/2 grams of salt pour in 1/2 teaspoon 2.5 milliliters of vanilla extract then beat the ingredients just until smooth avoid over beating the batter or else your waffles may turn out dense finally spray your preheated waffle iron with cooking spray and pour some of the batter onto it making sure not to over fill the moulds cook the waffles until they're golden brown about 5 minutes and enjoyto make waffles first pre-heat your waffle iron then add two eggs to a large bowl and beat them with a whisk or hand mixer until they're fluffy beating the eggs first we'll make your waffles light and airy add 2 cups 260 grams of all-purpose flour 1 in 3/4 cups 415 milliliters of milk and half a cup 120 milliliters of vegetable oil to the bowl next add 1 tablespoon 12 and 1/2 grams of sugar 4 teaspoons 15 grams of baking powder and 1/4 teaspoon 1 and 1/2 grams of salt pour in 1/2 teaspoon 2.5 milliliters of vanilla extract then beat the ingredients just until smooth avoid over beating the batter or else your waffles may turn out dense finally spray your preheated waffle iron with cooking spray and pour some of the batter onto it making sure not to over fill the moulds cook the waffles until they're golden brown about 5 minutes and enjoy

title: How to Measure Flour
description:
Learn how to measure flour with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Measure-Flour

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: before you measure unsifted flour use a spoon to stir the flour in the original container to fluff it up then spoon the flour into your measuring cup until the cup is slightly more full do not pack the flour into the cup use a straight edge such as the back of a knife to level off the top of the flower by running it against the rim of the cup hold the measuring cup over the flour container so the excess flour drops back in youbefore you measure unsifted flour use a spoon to stir the flour in the original container to fluff it up then spoon the flour into your measuring cup until the cup is slightly more full do not pack the flour into the cup use a straight edge such as the back of a knife to level off the top of the flower by running it against the rim of the cup hold the measuring cup over the flour container so the excess flour drops back in you

title: How to Melt Almond Bark
description:
Learn how to melt almond bark with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Melt-Almond-Bark

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to melt almond bark in a double boiler chop it into small pieces that are roughly the same size so the chocolate will melt evenly fill the bottom of the double boiler with water and place the almond bark in the top part of the double boiler turn your stove to medium-high heat stirring the almond bar constantly until it melts when all of the chunks are melted turn the heat off and remove the top pan from the double boilerto melt almond bark in a double boiler chop it into small pieces that are roughly the same size so the chocolate will melt evenly fill the bottom of the double boiler with water and place the almond bark in the top part of the double boiler turn your stove to medium-high heat stirring the almond bar constantly until it melts when all of the chunks are melted turn the heat off and remove the top pan from the double boiler

title: How to Melt Chocolate
description:
This sweet video will give you some tips on #howto melt chocolate!

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Melt-Chocolate

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: if you want to melt chocolate in a microwave place the chocolate into a microwave-safe bowl microwave the chocolate on low heat for 30 to 40 seconds or for about 10 to 15 seconds if you are using small chocolate chips stir the chocolate with a wooden spoon then a microwave for an additional 10 to 15 seconds be careful not to overcook the chocolate or it will become scorched and unusable stir again then continue microwaving in 10 second bursts until the chocolate is fully meltedif you want to melt chocolate in a microwave place the chocolate into a microwave-safe bowl microwave the chocolate on low heat for 30 to 40 seconds or for about 10 to 15 seconds if you are using small chocolate chips stir the chocolate with a wooden spoon then a microwave for an additional 10 to 15 seconds be careful not to overcook the chocolate or it will become scorched and unusable stir again then continue microwaving in 10 second bursts until the chocolate is fully melted

title: How to Open a Coconut
description:
The only video you need to learn #howto open a coconut.

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Open-a-Coconut

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to open a coconut start by poking a hole in the top with a knife and draining out all the water then bake the coconut in the oven at 375 degrees Fahrenheit 190 degrees Celsius for 10 minutes or until a crack forms in the shell once the shell is cracked take the coconut out of the oven and put it in a plastic bag then hit the bag against a hard surface until the coconut breaks opento open a coconut start by poking a hole in the top with a knife and draining out all the water then bake the coconut in the oven at 375 degrees Fahrenheit 190 degrees Celsius for 10 minutes or until a crack forms in the shell once the shell is cracked take the coconut out of the oven and put it in a plastic bag then hit the bag against a hard surface until the coconut breaks open

title: How to Oven Cook Sausages
description:
Learn how to oven cook sausages with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Oven-Cook-Sausages

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to oven cooked sausages take them out of the fridge 20 minutes before you want to bake them preheat your oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit and line a shallow baking pan with foil if the sausages are linked together cut them apart with scissors then put them in the pan be sure to space them evenly apart bake the meat for 20 minutes then cut into one of the sausages to make sure it's browned all the way through if it's still pink inside bake the sausages for 10 more minutes then enjoyto oven cooked sausages take them out of the fridge 20 minutes before you want to bake them preheat your oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit and line a shallow baking pan with foil if the sausages are linked together cut them apart with scissors then put them in the pan be sure to space them evenly apart bake the meat for 20 minutes then cut into one of the sausages to make sure it's browned all the way through if it's still pink inside bake the sausages for 10 more minutes then enjoy

title: How to Pan Fry Salmon
description:
Learn how to pan fry salmon with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Pan-Fry-Salmon

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to pan fry salmon pat the fish dry with paper towels then drizzle the fillets with olive oil and sprinkle them with salt and pepper when you place the salmon in your pan place it skin side down if you want to have crispy salmon skin if you don't plan to serve the skin on the fish place it into the pan skin side up cook the salmon for two minutes on each side on medium heat and use a spatula to press the fish down during the first one to two minutes of cooking so it doesn't curl up let the salmon rest for about 5 minutes before servingto pan fry salmon pat the fish dry with paper towels then drizzle the fillets with olive oil and sprinkle them with salt and pepper when you place the salmon in your pan place it skin side down if you want to have crispy salmon skin if you don't plan to serve the skin on the fish place it into the pan skin side up cook the salmon for two minutes on each side on medium heat and use a spatula to press the fish down during the first one to two minutes of cooking so it doesn't curl up let the salmon rest for about 5 minutes before serving

title: How to Parboil Potatoes
description:
Learn how to parboil potatoes with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Parboil-Potatoes

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/wikihow/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wikihow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
subtitles: to parboil potatoes first wash the potatoes and peel off the skin if you'd like them to be skinless then cut the potatoes into equal size pieces place the potatoes in a wide saucepan and fill the pan with enough cold water to just cover the potatoes bring the water to a rolling boil over high heat then turn the heat off let the potatoes sit in the pan for 5 minutes finally drain the water and transfer the potatoes to a plate to cool store your parboiled potatoes in the refrigerator until you're ready to use them youto parboil potatoes first wash the potatoes and peel off the skin if you'd like them to be skinless then cut the potatoes into equal size pieces place the potatoes in a wide saucepan and fill the pan with enough cold water to just cover the potatoes bring the water to a rolling boil over high heat then turn the heat off let the potatoes sit in the pan for 5 minutes finally drain the water and transfer the potatoes to a plate to cool store your parboiled potatoes in the refrigerator until you're ready to use them you to parboil potatoes first wash the potatoes and peel off the skin if you'd like them to be skinless then cut the potatoes into equal size pieces place the potatoes in a wide saucepan and fill the pan with enough cold water to just cover the potatoes bring the water to a rolling boil over high heat then turn the heat off let the potatoes sit in the pan for 5 minutes finally drain the water and transfer the potatoes to a plate to cool store your parboiled potatoes in the refrigerator until you're ready to use them you
